content:
Beiliu
Beiliu (Chinese: 北流; pinyin: Běiliú; Zhuang language: Bwzliuz) is a county-level city in the southeast of Guangxi, China. It is under the administration of Yulin city. As of 2016, it had a population of 1.5 million.{"citetype": "web", "url": "http://www.beiliu.gov.cn/info/241651", "date": "20 October 2016", "publisher": "Government of Beiliu", "scripttitle": "zh:\u5e7f\u897f\u5317\u6d41\u5e02\u6982\u51b5"}

Economy
Guangxi Sanhuan, a large ceramics manufacturer, is headquartered in the city.
